entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels and Ice Jam Potential on Interior Rivers... At 437 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wylliesburg to near Dryburg to near Hitesburg. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and central Halifax Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scottsburg, or near Halifax, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
